verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינ֗וֹת <S%H5058><s%> on Neginoth מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David בְּקָרְאִ֡י <S%H7121><s%> me when I call עֲנֵ֤נִי ׀ <S%H6030><s%> Hear אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> O God צִדְקִ֗י <S%H6664><s%> of my righteousness בַּ֭צָּר <S%H6862><s%> me [when I was] in distress הִרְחַ֣בְתָּ <S%H7337><s%> thou hast enlarged לִּ֑י חָ֝נֵּ֗נִי <S%H2603><s%> have mercy וּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> upon me and hear תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <S%H8605><s%> my prayer

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> O ye sons אִ֡ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of men עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> how long מֶ֬ה <S%H4100><s%> how כְבוֹדִ֣י <S%H3519><s%> [will ye turn] my glory לִ֭כְלִמָּה <S%H3639><s%> confusion תֶּאֱהָב֣וּן <S%H157><s%> love רִ֑יק <S%H7385><s%> vanity תְּבַקְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1245><s%> [and] seek כָזָ֣ב <S%H3577><s%> deceitful סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

וּדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> But know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִפְלָ֣ה <S%H6395><s%> hath set apart יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD חָסִ֣יד <S%H2623><s%> him that is godly ל֑וֹ יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for himself the LORD יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> will hear בְּקָרְאִ֥י <S%H7121><s%> when I call אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> about

רִגְז֗וּ <S%H7264><s%> Stand in awe וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּ֫חֱטָ֥אוּ <S%H2398><s%> and sin אִמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> not commune בִ֭לְבַבְכֶם <S%H3824><s%> with your own heart עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מִשְׁכַּבְכֶ֗ם <S%H4904><s%> upon your bed וְדֹ֣מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> and be still סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

זִבְח֥וּ <S%H2076><s%> Offer זִבְחֵי־ <S%H2077><s%> the sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> of righteousness וּ֝בִטְח֗וּ <S%H982><s%> and put your trust אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD

רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> [There be] many אֹמְרִים֮ <S%H559><s%> that say מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יַרְאֵ֪נוּ֫ <S%H7200><s%> Who will shew ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good נְֽסָה־ <S%H5375><s%> lift thou up עָ֭לֵינוּ <S%H5921><s%> up א֨וֹר <S%H216><s%> the light פָּנֶ֬יךָ <S%H6440><s%> of thy countenance יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> LORD

נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast put שִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> gladness בְלִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> in my heart מֵעֵ֬ת <S%H6256><s%> more than in the time דְּגָנָ֖ם <S%H1715><s%> [that] their corn וְתִֽירוֹשָׁ֣ם <S%H8492><s%> and their wine רָֽבּוּ׃ <S%H7231><s%> increased

בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace יַחְדָּו֮ <S%H3162><s%> I will both אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <S%H7901><s%> lay me down וְאִ֫ישָׁ֥ן <S%H3462><s%> and sleep כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for thou LORD לְבָדָ֑ד <S%H910><s%> only לָ֝בֶ֗טַח <S%H983><s%> in safety תּוֹשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3427><s%> makest me dwell
